code: import axios from'axios';var headers={'Authorization':"Basic ZGVtbzpwQDU1dzByZA==",'Content-Type':"application/json"};export var getContacts=function getContacts(){return axios.get('/api/contacts',{headers:headers});};export var createContact=function createContact(data){return axios.post('/api/contacts',data,{headers:headers});};export var updateContact=function updateContact(data){return axios.put('/api/contacts',data,{headers:headers});};export var deleteContact=function deleteContact(id){return axios.delete("/api/contacts?id=".concat(id),{headers:headers});};
